title: The Leopard's Lines
description: A novel about a young American physician working at a hospital serving destitute patients in the heart of Africa who is lured into a battle to save wildlife from poachers. Unbeknownst to him, his foes include a network of influential interests that extend to the worldâ€™s most powerful people. While confronting his opponents, the physician struggles with demons from his past as he eludes attempts on his life. With help from leopards and a woman with whom he falls in love, he searches for an escape from his ordeal.
author: Karl C Klontz
